intents.name: DoSetPrinterOn
intents.description: User is asking for printer turn on
utterances: would you turn the printer on
i need you to set the printer on
turn the damn printer on thank you

intents.name: DoSetPrinterOff
intents.description: User is asking to turn printer off
utterances: would you turn the printer off
i need you to set the printer off
turn the damn printer off thank you
